import "./about.css"; import wale from "./wale.JPG"; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I am Olawale Peter, a front-end developer with a passion for developing user-friendly websites and web applications. Proficient in Java script, HTML, CSS and React. Familiar with Photoshop, Figma, Adobe Xd and other design tools. strong ability to create responsive and visually appealing designs with provem ability to work effectively in a team enviroment and deliver projects on time and within budget. Strong attention to detail and a passion for staying current with the latest technology and industry trends'

I am Olawale Peter, a front end developer with a passion for creating visually appealing and funtional websites/webapps.My skill set includes a solid understanding of design softwares such as Adobe photoshop, Adobe Xd and Figma as well as a strong proficiency in Wordpress, React, HTML,CSS and JavaScript. As a front end developer, I'm committed to creating websites that not only look great but also provide a seamless user experience. I understand the importance of user interface design I am able to apply my knowledge of design principles to create engaging and user-friendly web experience. I am constantly learning new techniques and best practices to improve my skills and stay up to date with the latest trends in front end development. In addition to my technical skills, I'm a team player and a strong communicator, able to collaborate effectively with designers, developers and stakeholders to achieve project goals.
); }; export default About;
